text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Huh? Why I chase after Maruzen?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I know what it is that's kept Sakura<n>Chiyono O going all this
time. It's pure<n>admiration, unadulterated by fear or<n>
resignation.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If she can just remember that feeling,<n>maybe she can pull
herself out of this<n>slump.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Well, um... Because she's faster than<n>anyone, and
stronger...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: She's... everything I'm not.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ever since I was little, I've been good<n>at running, and I
loved it... so I joined a<n>club, ran in races, and took lots of
first<n>places.

text_block_list.name: Relative
text_block_list.text:
My my, Chiyo—well, aren't you<n>talented! I hear you're
going to join<n>Tracen Academy one day?

text_block_list.name: Young Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I'm gonna be the best runner<n>ever! My brother helps
me train at<n>home every day!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
With my smart brother's help, I<n>managed to pass the
academy's<n>brutal exam with decent grades. I<n>arrived on
campus with my head held<n>high, only to find...

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, did you see Mr. C.B. in that<n>scrimmage?! The way she
passed<n>everyone at the end was sick—I've<n>never seen
anything like it!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
No, no, it's all about Oguri Cap! Like,<n>she has to be a genius
runner—her<n>acceleration is insane!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: At Tracen Academy, I was just a<n>normal girl.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ...I'm gonna head out, then!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Chiyo. The instructor isn't here,<n>so there's no training
today.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh, I know! I was just going to<n>practice by myself!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Hahhh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: The more I ran, the deeper the truth<n>sank in.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Huff... wheeze...

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Mm, not bad for a new student! We<n>have some things to
work on, but<n>we'll tackle them one by one!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ("For a new student"...)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ...Instructor, what do you think my<n>strengths are?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Well, while you don't put on a show,<n>you play it safe and
win in the end.<n>Plus you're dedicated, and clearly put<n>in a
lot of work on the fundamentals.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: A safe, dedicated runner.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Is that enough to become anything?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: What do I even want to become<n>here?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Then, one day... one fateful day...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky is shooting farther and<n>farther ahead! Three
lengths, now four<n>lengths in front—there's no stopping<n>
her!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: There she was... a logic-defying,<n>breathtaking "hot rod."

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: W-wow...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Everything I wasn't—it was all<n>bundled together there in red.
I was<n>awestruck.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
My pounding heart refused to calm<n>down. Unable to resist, I
rode that<n>wave of emotions, piecing together<n>the words
scattered about my brain...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I may be a safe, dedicated runner...<n>but I won't stop there. I
want to go<n>further... further and further beyond!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I don't care how tough training gets,<n>or if she's way out of
reach, or how<n>long it takes. I want to be faster,<n>stronger,
like her...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I want to be Maruzensky!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: In an instant, my whole world lit up.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Time to dig in!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Spaghetti with... coconut jelly and<n>tiramisu? Are old trends
making a<n>comeback?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, ahaha! Nothing like that. It's<n>just, someone I really
look up to was<n>eating this, so I couldn't help myself.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Umm, this should be all the magazines<n>with a special feature
on Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that's a lot! Thanks a bunch!<n>Mind if I borrow them
all?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Of course not, by all means... Hehe,<n>you must really like
Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Hm? Ah... Ehehe, yeah!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (Maybe this is a little too early...No, you know what? "To see thedawn, you must run toward it"!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
All right, this is going to be my new<n>morning routine!
Chiyono O, G-O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I remember now... I wanted so<n>badly to stand by
Maruzen's side.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
But I forgot all that, and became so<n>lost I didn't know what
to do with<n>myself...
choice_data_list: And what do you want to do now?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Now...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I want to fight!
